channel.title: Docker Compose on Foundries.io
channel.description: Recent content in Docker Compose on Foundries.io

item.title: Using docker-compose.yml with Portainer
item.description: Portainer has been a great asset and we have started to rely on it for single-container image management. Unfortunately, Portainer has been designed for 2 key use-cases. single containers and “stacks” that are meant to be deployed onto Kubernetes or Swarm orchestrators. For many of our demos we want to manage a suite of containers and orchestrate their startup so we can manage large container suites like the 9+ container-based micro-services that comprise the Edge-X project.
